news.title: TV on the Radio Enlist Flying Lotus, Sudan Archives, Moor Mother, and Spellling for Brooklyn Mini-Festival
news.summary: The special event, called There Goes the Neighborhood, takes place at Under the K Bridge Park in September

news.title: Watch Mavi and Smino’s Video for New Song “Potluck”
news.summary: Another new collaborative effort from Mavi, following “Landgrab,” his recent team-up with Earl Sweatshirt

news.title: Paramore’s Zac Farro Announces Debut Solo Album, Shares New Song: Listen
news.summary: After years of making music in the side project Halfnoise, Farro is releasing Operator under his own name

news.title: The Beths Announce New Album, Share Video for New Song: Watch
news.summary: Straight Line Was a Lie follows the New Zealand indie-rock band’s 2022 full-length Expert in a Dying Field

news.title: Radiohead and the Smile’s Thom Yorke Shares New Video for “Dialing In”: Watch
news.summary: The collaboration with Weirdcore is tied to the upcoming Apple TV+ series Smoke

news.title: Brandy and Monica Announce Co-Headlining Tour
news.summary: The beloved R&B duo heads out on its first-ever joint tour this autumn, with support from Kelly Rowland, Muni Long, and Jamal Roberts

news.title: Mac DeMarco Announces New Album Guitar, Shares Video for New Song “Home”: Watch
news.summary: The Canadian musician wrote, recorded, produced, and mixed his follow-up to 2023’s Five Easy Hot Dogs and One Wayne G
